content: this square designed whilst i was pregnant and named after my baby girl atalia which means god is great i feel privileged to be part of the friends around the world 3rd anniversary cal https //calcrochetalong com/friends-around-the-world-cals/ and the release of this square coincides with atalia s first birthday in march 2019 i hope you enjoy this pattern its super simple and can be made in a single or as many colours you choose
